name: Noah's Ark 2: Son of Noah: Ark Rising
name_original: Noah's Ark 2: Son of Noah: Ark Rising
description:
Just when you though the flood was over, the lord has returned to drown the wickedness of the world, once and for all. This time it's up to you, son of Noah, to rescue the creatures of the world and return them to the ark for salvation.

Bring out every kind of living creature for this Action Packed Biblical Adventure.

NOTE: Requires a controller

Controls:

Right-Trigger: Accelerate

Left-Stick: Steer

Left-Trigger (Hold): Charge Tether

Left-Trigger (Release): Shoot Tether

Right-Stick: Aim Tether

Created by Rob and Alex Gross
